Trade/Device Name(s): Sensititre® Haemophilus influenzae/Streptococcus species MIC Susceptibility Plates
Sensititre Haemophilus influenzae/Streptococcus pneumoniae (HP) MIC Susceptibility Plates
Submitter Information: TREK Diagnostic Systems Inc. Magellan Biosciences
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sensititre Haemophilus influenzae/Streptococcus species MIC Susceptibility Plates for Daptomycin susceptibility testing
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative and/or qualitative susceptibility testing of Haemophilus influenzae and Streptococcus species from clinical specimens, with Daptomycin, using Sensititre MIC plates read manually or automatically
